Get stomach contents

Source: R/get-all-stomachs.R
get_stomach.Rd

Get stomach contents

Usage

get_survey_stomachs(
  ssid = NULL,
  unsorted_only = FALSE,
  usability = NULL,
  major = NULL
)

get_all_stomachs(unsorted_only = FALSE, major = NULL, usability = NULL)

Arguments

ssid

A numeric vector of survey series IDs. Run get_ssids() for a look-up table of available survey series IDs with surveys series descriptions.

unsorted_only

Remove sorted biological data ('keepers' and 'discards' and unknown). Default = FALSE. IPHC codes may be different to other surveys.

usability

A vector of usability codes to include. Defaults to all.

major

Character string (or vector, though doesn't work yet with cache_pbs_data) of major stat area code to include (characters). Use get_major_areas() to lookup area codes with descriptions.

On this page
